--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> --- Astrotrain / Dead-End / Drag Strip ---
> 
> Astrotrain lands at the Dark Avian, his radar shows that Cyclonus 
and 
> the new decepticons are close behind, and should land immediately 
> after him. His hatch opens to let Wildrider out.


::BLINDCHAOS AND DOMNIJOE::

    Domnijoe lands beside Astrotrian, letting Blindchaos out. She 
immediately transforms when she is free of him and gives the Dark 
Avain a soaking, pleased stare.
    "SOOOOooooo...this is the new HQ?" she says, staring at 
Astrotrian. "Nice decor. Must be impressive on the inside too."
    "Yer being flattering again, Dom." Blindschaos says. He moves 
closer to absorb the new building before them. "I'm eager to meet the 
welcoming commitee."
    Domnijoe sighs. At least he wasn't smiling that infernal grin of 
his.
    "I wouldn't get too touchy-feely" she says. "If Meg's is here, he 
ain't gonna be happy to have stangers."
    Blindchaos's grin warped into something Domnijoe had only seen 
once..the minute before he pulled apart his victim's internal
systems. 
His victim hadn't answered the questions as Blindchaos wanted. She 
shoved the thought from her mind. His grin was disturbing enough 
without THAT memory.
    "Yer always bragging about how good a leader Megatron is." 
Blindchaos said. "If he's as good as you say, He'll have a lot of
work 
for me."

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

*******************************
